metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000383 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: GNU Emacs version 25.3.1 (and other versions most likely) ignores umask when creating a backup save file ("[ORIGINAL_FILENAME]~") resulting in files that may be world readable or otherwise accessible in ways not intended by the user running the emacs binary.

notes.Note: leosilva> It really seems to not be a vulnerability. See all the comments around this issue in emacs. I'll set it as ignored.

criterions.comment: emacs24: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
